message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1200000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $1300000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure that the product finds a worthy owner who will appreciate its true worth and utilize it to its full potential. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
